title: Ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.
highlights: Supports Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and more

summary: The official Ollama Python library for easy integration with Python applications.

summary: A Rust client library for interacting with the Ollama API.

summary: Haystack integration for Ollama models, enabling retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.
